project_manifest.mission_charter: To build and sustain viable, long-term economic resilience for San Francisco businesses.
project_manifest.core_philosophy: Build First, Don't Break. (Structure Creates Speed).
project_manifest.technical_imperative: NO_BOOLEANS_STRICT_LIFECYCLE (Status is never 'True', it is 'Verified_at_[Timestamp]' or 'Expired').

brand_identity_engine.tagline: Built for Speed. Built to Win. Built to Last.
brand_identity_engine.visual_language: Dark mode, Neon telemetry, Carbon fiber textures.

driver.key_feature: Can generate 'Secure Tokens' for external viewing.

crew_chief.constraint: Cannot view raw 'Vault' files without Driver's token.

scout.goal: Monetize deal flow via 'The Resilience Audit'.

entry_points.description: Interactive 'Report Card' using compound conditional questions.
Onboarding hook. Simulates a crash (e.g., Server Failure) to sell resilience.

certification_product.name: The Resilience Tech Inspection
certification_product.validity_rule: Dynamic. Status degrades if verification age > 180 days.

triage_matrix.hands_on_skeptic: Assign to Grid (Member) -> Use 'Sponsorship Override' (30-Day Free Trial).

scout_program_mechanics.target_persona: Business Brokers, VCs, Commercial Real Estate Agents
scout_program_mechanics.clawback_rule: If member churns < 90 days, commission is voided.

the_paddock_vault.link_rot_bot: Automated monthly ping to verify backup links are active. Downgrade status if 404.
the_paddock_vault.escrow_lock: Admin passwords for DFY clients remain locked until final payment.

liability_shields.text: Certification is valid ONLY at timestamp of issuance. Items imply a 'Decay Rate' of 180 days.
Starter Club provides operational audits, not legal or tax advice.

community_policing.consequence: Immediate ban / Placement Fee for poaching.
